title: Interstate or overseas permits
description:
Interstate parking permit can be used in Victoria. It Allows you to Park in an accessible parking bay to park your vehicle for twice the time allowed on the sign
Note: Any parking fees still apply

title: Using permit
description:
Permit can only be used when it is issued to the same individual who is inside the vehicle
Must be clearly displayed so that the permit number and expiry date are visible to anyone outside the vehicle
Cannot park in restricted locations.
Cannot park for free in areas where parking fees apply

title: Check your eligibility
list: A functional assessment by a medical practitioner which determines that
description:
The person has a significant mobility impairment such that they are required to use a mobility aid or device and that a parking bay
Hat the person has an acute or chronic medical condition associated with a mobility impairment
To a significant cognitive, behavioural or neurological impairment, the person is unable to independently mobilise safely without the continuous support of another person.

title: Apply for an Australian Disability Parking permit
description: You can apply for the Australian Disability parking permit by clicking the following link https://www.accessibleparking.vic.gov.au/permits/individuals/
